title = #title:VARCHAR#
summary = #summary:VARCHAR#
id_section = #idSection:INTEGER#
web_title = #webTitle:VARCHAR#
from_date = #fromDate:DATE#

popular = #popular:INTEGER#
showInAgenda = #showinagenda:INTEGER#
agenda_date = #agendaDate:DATE#

frontCover_id = #frontcoverId:INTEGER#

agenda_id = #agendaId:INTEGER#

lastNewsThumb_id = #lastnewsthumbId:INTEGER#
deleted = #deleted:INTEGER#
content = #content:LONGVARCHAR#

where id = #id:INTEGER#

update NOTE set title = #title:VARCHAR#, summary = #summary:VARCHAR#, id_section = #idSection:INTEGER#, web_title = #webTitle:VARCHAR#, from_date = #fromDate:DATE#, to_date = #toDate:DATE#, frontCover = #frontcover:INTEGER#, popular = #popular:INTEGER#, showInAgenda = #showinagenda:INTEGER#, agenda_date = #agendaDate:DATE#, frontCoverExt = #frontcoverext:VARCHAR#, frontCover_id = #frontcoverId:INTEGER#, agendaExt = #agendaext:VARCHAR#, agenda_id = #agendaId:INTEGER#, lastNewsCoverExt = #lastnewscoverext:VARCHAR#, lastNewsCover_id = #lastnewscoverId:INTEGER#, lastNewsThumbExt = #lastnewsthumbext:VARCHAR#, lastNewsThumb_id = #lastnewsthumbId:INTEGER#, deleted = #deleted:INTEGER#, content = #content:LONGVARCHAR#, EXTRA_HTML = #extraHtml:LONGVARCHAR# where id = #id:INTEGER#

update NOTE set title = #title:VARCHAR#, summary = #summary:VARCHAR#, id_section = #idSection:INTEGER#, web_title = #webTitle:VARCHAR#, from_date = #fromDate:DATE#, to_date = #toDate:DATE#, frontCover = #frontcover:INTEGER#, popular = #popular:INTEGER#, showInAgenda = #showinagenda:INTEGER#, agenda_date = #agendaDate:DATE#, frontCoverExt = #frontcoverext:VARCHAR#, frontCover_id = #frontcoverId:INTEGER#, agendaExt = #agendaext:VARCHAR#, agenda_id = #agendaId:INTEGER#, lastNewsCoverExt = #lastnewscoverext:VARCHAR#, lastNewsCover_id = #lastnewscoverId:INTEGER#, lastNewsThumbExt = #lastnewsthumbext:VARCHAR#, lastNewsThumb_id = #lastnewsthumbId:INTEGER#, deleted = #deleted:INTEGER# where id = #id:INTEGER#
sqlMap.select: select note.id, note.title, note.summary, note.id_section, note.web_title, note.from_date, note.to_date, note.frontCover, note.popular, note.showInAgenda, note.agenda_date, note.deleted, note.frontCoverExt, note.frontCover_id, note.agendaExt, note.agenda_id, note.lastNewsCoverExt, note.lastNewsCover_id, note.lastNewsThumbExt, note.lastNewsThumb_id from NOTE note, NOTE_COUNTRY nc where note.id = nc.id_note and note.deleted = 0 and nc.deleted = 0 and nc.id_country = #id:INTEGER# and CURDATE() >= note.from_date and (note.to_date is null or note.to_date >= CURDATE()) and note.frontCover = 1 order by note.id desc

select note.id, note.title, note.summary, note.id_section, note.web_title, note.from_date, note.to_date, note.frontCover, note.popular, note.showInAgenda, note.agenda_date, note.deleted, note.frontCoverExt, note.frontCover_id, note.agendaExt, note.agenda_id, note.lastNewsCoverExt, note.lastNewsCover_id, note.lastNewsThumbExt, note.lastNewsThumb_id from NOTE note, NOTE_COUNTRY nc where note.id = nc.id_note and note.deleted = 0 and nc.deleted = 0 and nc.id_country = #id:INTEGER# and note.agenda_date >= CURDATE() and note.showInAgenda = 1 order by note.agenda_date

select note.id, note.title, note.summary, note.id_section, note.web_title, note.from_date, note.to_date, note.frontCover, note.popular, note.showInAgenda, note.agenda_date, note.deleted, note.frontCoverExt, note.frontCover_id, note.agendaExt, note.agenda_id, note.lastNewsCoverExt, note.lastNewsCover_id, note.lastNewsThumbExt, note.lastNewsThumb_id from NOTE note, NOTE_COUNTRY nc where note.id = nc.id_note and note.deleted = 0 and nc.deleted = 0 and nc.id_country = #id:INTEGER# and CURDATE() >= note.from_date and (note.to_date is null or note.to_date >= CURDATE()) and note.popular = 1 and note.frontCover = 0 order by note.to_date desc

select note.id, note.title, note.summary, note.web_title, note.from_date from NOTE note, NOTE_COUNTRY nc where note.id = nc.id_note and note.deleted = 0 and nc.deleted = 0 and nc.id_country = #idCountry:INTEGER# and note.id_section = #idSection:INTEGER# and CURDATE() >= note.from_date and (note.to_date is null or note.to_date >= CURDATE()) order by note.to_date desc

select note.id, note.title, note.summary, note.id_section, note.web_title, note.from_date, note.to_date, note.frontCover, note.popular, note.showInAgenda, note.agenda_date, note.deleted, note.frontCoverExt, note.frontCover_id, note.agendaExt, note.agenda_id, note.lastNewsCoverExt, note.lastNewsCover_id, note.lastNewsThumbExt, note.lastNewsThumb_id from NOTE note, NOTE_COUNTRY nc where note.id = nc.id_note and note.deleted = 0 and nc.deleted = 0 and nc.id_country = #countryId:INTEGER# and note.from_date = #fromDate:DATE# and note.web_title = #webTitle:VARCHAR#
